name: Timeless (itch) (AJ)
description:
Important!

There is a bug at the end of the game: the end credits screen doesn't appear. When the screen gets white it means you've reached the end of the game. If you are reading this after seeing it, thank you for playing!

What if you found a remote control to rewind everything around you?

This is a short narrative and puzzle game about rewinding time, meeting your grandfather back in the 70's and trying to enter forbidden places in your house.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Z to rewind and X to go forward

Z to continue dialog

Assets and software used

All assets except some sound effects were made from scratch during the jam period, using this software:

  • 2D Art: Krita
  • Gameplay and design: Unity 2020.1
  • Code: Visual Studio 2019
  • Music: Reaper
Soundtrack AJ Norman · Timeless - Videogame Original Soundtrack
